description: This file defines an asynchronous script that creates and runs an agent to search for Airbnb listings using MCP and Llama 4 models. It includes setup instructions, imports necessary modules, and defines the main execution logic for the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function that initializes and runs the Airbnb search agent with specified instructions.
